title: Exception: Trying to reuse disposable LengthPrefixedPayloadDecoder
body:
### Description
Got the exception below while syncing Onyx.

```
2020-07-01 10:45:22.051+10:00 | nioEventLoopGroup-3-15 | ERROR | RpcHandler | Unhandled error while processes req/response
java.lang.IllegalStateException: Trying to reuse disposable LengthPrefixedPayloadDecoder
```

Yep, came here to report that I am seeing these on Altona. 172 of them in the last 8 hours.
